I like them to be clean. Just want to know what song it is, nothing more.
Sorry xD.
Ack, they dont even have track numbers in the tags! Also, the tracks are oversampled at 48kHz, which presumably means there's some quality loss there

You're right, oversampling will decrease some quality and my intention is to upload Rammstein at it's best quality.
This torrent even misses some songs!
I'll rip them again at 44.1 kHz with tracknumbers in the tags. Just give me a week or so and please help seeding when I've uploaded the torrent.

Thanks a million!  These songs REALLY rock the giant Cerwin Vegas (VS-150) which are being driven by a CLEAN 300 watts per channel from a vintage Sansui amp.  I wish more folks cared about the quality of the music they rip...

Additionally it is nice to include m3us and md5s.
